name: SimilarWeb
main_data_source: App Usage, Web Data, Web Traffic
full_ticker_coverage: FB, AMZN, NFLX, CARS, GRUB, BKNG, EXPE, TRIP, DAAL, TRVG, WMT, M, TGT, BBY, WSM, NKE, LULU, RL, PMI, UN, CRM, DBX, INTU, RHT, DOCU, SQ, PYPL, LC, C, JPM
full_sector_coverage: Internet, Travel & Leisure, Retail, Consumer Products, Software, Finance & Payments
sectors: Agriculture, Autos, Consumer, Financial Services, Gaming, Healthcare, Insurance, Internet, Media, Restaurants & Food Delivery, Retail, Software (SaaS), TMT & Entertainment, Travel

advantages: Largest panel in the world, proprietary algorithms including direct measurement to calibrate estimations, leading to a robust and accurate data set. Coverage of all websites and apps globally, with data refreshing daily.
use_cases: Measuring the digital performance of companies, understanding companies’ digital and Go-To-Market strategies, identifying industry leaders and market share swings
